mapper.select: SELECT draft_document_status AS draftDocumentStatus, approval_document_file_save_name AS approvalDocumentFileSaveName, member_name AS memberName, document_date AS documentDate, final_approval_member_name AS finalApprovalMemberName, final_approval_date AS finalApprovalDate, document_opinion_count AS documentOpinionCount document_attatch_file_count AS documentAttatchFileCount FROM approval_document ORDER BY document_date DESC
SELECT document_form_title FROM approval_document WHERE approval_document_code = #{approvalDocumentCode}

SELECT pr.member_name AS memberName, pr.member_position_name AS memberPositionName, pr.purchase_requisition_date AS purchaseRequisitionDate, pr.purchase_requisition_pay_day AS purchaseRequisitionPayDay, pr.purchase_requisition_total_price ASpurchaseRequisitionTotalPrice, pr.purchase_requisition_item_category AS purchaseRequisitionItemCategory, pr.purchase_requisition_item AS purchaseRequisitionItem, pr.purchase_requisition_item_unit AS purchaseRequisitionItemUnit, pr.purchase_requisition_item_count AS purchaseRequisitionItemCount, pr.purchase_requisition_item_price ASpurchaseRequisitionItemPrice, pr.purchase_requisition_etc AS purchaseRequisitionEtc FROM purchase_requisition AS pr JOIN approval_document AS ad ON pr.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code;

SELECT dd.disbursement_document_name AS disbursementDocumentName, dd.department_name AS departmentName, dd.member_name AS memberName, dd.member_employee_code AS memberEmployeeCode dd.disbursement_document_account AS disbursementDocumentAccount, dd.disbursement_document_terms_of_payment AS disbursementDocumentTermsOfPayment, dd.disbursement_document_date AS disbursementDocumentDate, dd.disbursement_document_request_date AS disbursementDocumentRequestDate, dd.disbursement_document_account AS disbursementDocumentAccount, dd.disbursement_document_expense_date AS disbursementDocumentExpenseDate, dd.disbursement_document_subject AS disbursementDocumentSubject dd.disbursement_document_contents AS disbursementDocumentContents, dd.disbursement_document_customer AS disbursementDocumentCustomer, dd.disbursement_document_price AS disbursementDocumentPrice, dd.disbursement_document_methods_of_payment AS disbursementDocumentMethodsOfPayment, dd.disbursement_document_etc AS disbursementDocumentEtc, dd.disbursement_document_evidence AS disbursementDocumentEvidence, FROM disbursement_document AS dd JOIN approval_document AS ad ON dd.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE ad.approval_document_code = #{approvalDocumentCode}

SELECT do.approval_opinion_desc AS approvalOpinionDesc do.approval_registrant_name AS approvalOpinionDesc do.document_opinion_date AS approvalOpinionDesc FROM document_opinion AS do JOIN approval_document AS ad ON do.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE approval_document_code = #{approvalDocumentCode}
